result.execSummary:
The defendant Merlyn J. Bennett was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
State plead to charge - probation 3 years - comply with the reporting conditions 
dismiss 15 TR 661.
Court questions defendant as to plea questionnaire.
Defendant entered plea of no contest to count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.  State argues sentencing.  Atty Hoffman argues sentencing.

COURT:  Sentence w/held probation 3 years - fine $843.00  - comply with the conditions and reporting with the  sex offender registry

15 TR 661 is dismissed
Atty Hoffman waived reading.  Court ng plea

Defendant Merlyn J. Bennett in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 15 TR 661.  Atty Hoffman waives preliminary exam.  Court questions defendant as to his right to a prelim.  Court finds probable cause and binds the defendant over for trial.

Defendant Merlyn J. Bennett in court with attorney Michael Charles Hoffman.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Merlyn J. Bennett in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.   SIBS $1000.00  Comply with sex offender rules.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.
